OUR QUALITY STANDARTS

As Ilke CNC Otomat, with ISO 9001:2015 certificate, we have a quality policy centered around costumer satisfaction and ever-progressing quality standarts.

Lowering the prices by efficiently using the time and resources

Providing personal development opportunities for our staff

Meeting the requirements of our staff, partners and suppliers and get them involved in the process of reaching our goals

By closely following technological advancements, paying attention on enviromental protection and energy efficiency

Providing required resources to maintain a constant quality grade

×

We are producing fast, feasible and reliable solutions to the automotive, machine, civil engineering, food and furniture industries with a management team of 20-plus years experience, 14 personel and ISO 9001:2015 quality certificate.
